text: Yes, it's a shame that Bugzilla doesn't have an edit button, but as I expect you worked out now there is at least a Preview tab so you can check your markdown. The cc's happen automatically according to user preferences that you can configure (<https://bugs.r-project.org/userprefs.cgi?tab=email>). I think the default is to cc anyone that has previously commented and R Core are included on everything.

text: Now we wait for R Core. I don't expect a quick response as such an old bug will have low priority and it will probably take someone a few hours to read through the discussion and consider our proposal. Maybe there will be a push to close issues before the next R release, but it may not even make it for that. However I have Paul Murrell coming to visit me over the summer when he is on sabbatical, so at a minimum I can ask him to look at it then!
